paper_abstract: The regularized shallow water (RSW) equation system is proposed together with a central-difference algorithm for its numerical solution. The possibilities of the new computational model are demonstrated for a 1D dam break and Le-Veque's perturbation tests, and for 2D asymmetric dam break test problems. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Regularized shallow water equations and a new method of numerical simulation of the open channel flows
